reviewText: Wow! I'm a huge fan of Paula Fernandes (another Brazilian singer) so when I noticed Tania's work, I decided to give this DVD a chance and it didn't disappoint at all. Not only do we get to see Portugues lyrics but also English AND Spanish subtitles to every single song Yay! There's a Selena song "Dreaming of You" in Portuguese version same with "Mientes" from a Mexican band called Camila again in Portuguese. PLEASE! Get this DVD you will love it!! (Plus, we get to see Paula Fernandes perform with Tania)
